key.name: oobe-complete
key.summary: Whether the Out-of-Box Experience has been completed
key.description: This key is used to determine if the application should show the setup wizard on startup.

key.name: cli-source
key.summary: The source for the h2mm-cli executable
key.description: Determines whether to use the bundled h2mm-cli executable or a custom one from the host system.

key.name: custom-cli-path
key.summary: Path to the custom h2mm-cli executable
key.description: The full filesystem path to the h2mm-cli executable to be used when 'cli-source' is set to 'custom'.
